name: AutoContinue Logic
description: A module for incorporating logic into the autocontinue surveys

project-settings.name:
Specify the autocontinue logic in json format
Sorry for the bad interface, but for now you must enter
a single-line json expression (no carraige returns)
where they keys are the instrument names and
the values are the expressions. Be sure to include
event names before variables if needed.
If a survey name exists as a key in this json array, then
the survey will only be GIVEN if the logic is true,
otherwise it will be SKIPPED.
{ "survey_instrument_name":"give survey if logic true"}
